page.title: 09HARMBY AREA-THE COMMUNITY
page.content: SINCE 1945 THERE HAVE BEEN MANY CHANGES.COUNCIL AND PRIVATE HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT AND THERE IS A LARGE PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATE AT HARMBY.THE OLD MANOR HAS BEEN CONVERTED TO MODERN DWELLINGS.FEW PEOPLE DISLIKE THE AREA,BUT SOME THOUGHT THE PEOPLE COULD BE MORE FRIENDLY.THE PEOPLE IN THE DALES CAN BE RATHER RESERVED. THE CHILDREN'S RECREATION FIELD AT HARMBY WAS ACQUIRED BY PARENTS RAISING FUNDS TO PURCHASE THE LAND AND EQUIPMENT.THERE IS A FLOURISHING PRE-SCHOOL PLAYGROUP AT HARMBY WHICH IS ORGANIZED BY A GROUP OF MOTHERS. HARMBY VILLAGE HALL AND SPENNITHORNE RECREATION GROUND WERE ALSO COMMUNITY PROJECTS.AT PRESENT PEOPLE ARE WORRIED ABOUT TRAFFIC CONJESTION ON HARMBY BANK;NO SPEED LIMIT AT SPENNITHORNE AND PLANS TO UPGRADE THE A684 INTO A BUSY TRUNK ROAD.
